title: NHL Rising Stars & Playoff Storylines
description:
Linda and Emily recap their latest travels: Emily bouncing around the country and Linda covering the Ducks vs. Kings game. Then, Buffalo's latest addition Owen Power joins the show to talk about his rising career. After that, our very own Bucci joins the show to talk playoff storylines.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: NHL Rising Stars & Playoff Storylines
